QuestData.Title: What the Draenei Found
QuestData.Description: They came here for an artifact? The miners must have found something in our crystal mine to the north.$B$BBy the Light, can you imagine how powerful that thing must be, to attract them all the way here from their spires?$B$BI suppose it is in their hands now... You'd have to be crazy to go looking for it...
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the Ancient Prism in the Aruuna Crystal Mine.
QuestData.RewardText: I was worried my little act wouldn't fool you, but you played your role perfectly.$B$BIn fact, I would like to ask for your help again.
